content:
# I successfully extracted an additional 2 iron plates, bringing the total to 3 iron plates in my inventory. However, the furnace is now empty, with no remaining resources.

# To continue building my factory, I need to craft an iron gear wheel, which requires 2 iron plates. 
# Since I have 3 iron plates, I can proceed to craft the iron gear wheel.

# Let's craft the iron gear wheel now.
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=1)  # Craft one iron gear wheel

# After crafting the gear wheel, I will now have the necessary components to craft the stone furnace.
# I will check my inventory to confirm the crafting process.
print(f"Inventory after crafting gear wheel: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after crafting the gear wheel.
